casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. ROBERT HENDERSON (13245)

Lavery, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued October 23 decision released November 21, 1995 *915David B. Bachman, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant) Marjorie Allen Dauster, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and David P. Gold, supervisory assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
